verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Parishudhan mahonnatha devan
(Holy and awesome God)
Paramengum vilangum maheshan
(Ruler whose light radiates)
Swargeeya sainyangal vazhthy sthuthikkunna
(The one who the armies of heaven praise)
Swarloka Nadhanam Mishiha
(The King of Heaven - The Messiah)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ha ha ha hallelujah (4)
Ha ha ha hallelujah (4)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Avan athbhutha manthiyam Daivam
(He is the wonderful counseler)
Nithya thathanum veeranam Daivam
(Everlasting Father, Mighty God)
Unnatha devan neethiyin sooryan
(God of Gods, the Light of Peace)
Rajadhi Raajanam Mishiha
(King of Kings - The Messiah)

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Ha ha ha hallelujah (4)
Ha ha ha hallelujah (4)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Koda kodi than dootha sainyavumay
(With legions of angel armies)
Megha roodanay varunnitha viravil
(He is comming soon in the clouds)
Than priya suthara thannodu cherppan
(To join with his own people with himself)
Vegam varunneshu mishiha
(He is the soon coming Jesus the Messiah)
